name: @milaidy/capacitor-desktop
description: Milaidy Desktop Plugin for Capacitor - System tray, global shortcuts, auto-launch for Electron
author: Milaidy

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs

platformDetails.browser: Limited support with graceful fallbacks (notifications via Web API, clipboard, basic window ops). System tray, global shortcuts, and auto-launch unavailable.
platformDetails.node: Full support via Electron (system tray, global shortcuts, auto-launch, window management, power monitoring, native notifications)
